## Standard format for script documentation

---

```shell
# DEPENDENCIES:
# - <DEP_HERE>    <DEP_SOURCE_HERE>
#
# install: 
# <command to install all dependencies here (OPTIONAL)>

#################[ DESCRIPTION ]##################

help_msg="
<program and arguments description here>
"

##################[ VARIABLES ]###################

<customizable variables here>

#########[ DO NOT EDIT BEYOND THIS POINT ]########

<code logic here>
```
